DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy bimatoprost ophthalmic solution 0.005 % 0.015 % compare bimatoprost ophthalmic solution 0.03 % once-daily application upper eyelid margin increase eyelash prominence
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Bimatoprost Ophthalmic Solution Increasing Eyelash Prominence
DOC.criteria: Female Caucasians 30 55 year age , hypotrichosis ( inadequate enough ) eyelashes Eyelash prominence assessment minimal moderate Any eye disease abnormality Any permanent eyeliner eyelash implant kind Any ocular surgery , semipermanent eyelash tint , eyelash extension application 3 month prior study entry Any use prescription eyelash growth product Any use counter eyelash growth product 6 month prior baseline Any use treatment may affect hair growth 6 month prior baseline
